name: LeakDetectionMonitoringType
title: Leak Detection Monitoring Type
description: Leak Detection Monitoring Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A leak detection system monitored at a central station that can alert authorities or designated contacts when a water leak is detected.
A leak detection system that sends alerts to a mobile device or application when a water leak is detected.
A leak detection system that activates a local audible or visual alarm at the property when a leak is detected, without remote notification.
A leak detection system where the property owner manually checks the system's status and indicators without automated alerts.
